welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wentzville, the charming city known for its small-town feel and friendly community. We invite you to explore our quaint shops and local restaurants and soak in the charm of our town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spirit Of St Louis Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The east terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The west terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
